00015 NODE_RADIUS=6;
00016 
00017 // GraphUI:
00018 var GraphUI = function(){};
00019 GraphUI.prototype = {
00020 
00021   initialize: function( frame, origin, displayOriginEdges, displayEdges ) {
00022     this['frame']=frame;    // frame dom object
00023     this['origin']=origin;  // origin dom object
00024 
00025     this['frame_width']=parseInt(frame.style.width);
00026     this['frame_height']=parseInt(frame.style.height);
00027     this['frame_top']=parseInt(frame.style.top);
00028     this['frame_left']=parseInt(frame.style.left);
00029 
00030     // switch for displaying origin edges
00031     this['displayOriginEdges'] = true;
00032     if ( displayOriginEdges != null ) {
00033       this['displayOriginEdges'] = displayOriginEdges;
00034     }
00035 
00036     // switch for displaying non-origin edges
00037     this['displayEdges'] = true;
00038     if ( displayEdges != null ) {
00039       this['displayEdges'] = displayEdges;
00040     }
00041 
00042   },
00043 
00044   // draw all nodes
00045   drawNodes: function() {
00046     for( var i=0; i<graph['nodes'].length; i++ ) {
00047       this.drawNode( graph.nodes[i] );
00048     }
00049   },
00050 
00051   // draw all edges
00052   drawEdges: function() {
00053     for( var i=0; i<graph.nodes.length; i++ ) {
00054       if ( this['displayOriginEdges'] ) {
00055         if ( graph.originEdges[i] ) {
00056           nodeI = graph.getNode(i);
00057           nodeJ = graph.origin;
00058           var distance = new Distance();
00059           distance.calculate( nodeI.position, nodeJ.position );
00060           this.drawEdge( nodeI, nodeJ, distance );
00061         }
00062       }
00063       
00064       if ( this['displayEdges'] ) {
00065         for( var j=0; j<graph.nodes.length; j++ ) {
00066           if ( graph.edges[i] && graph.edges[i][j] ) {
00067             nodeI = graph.getNode(i);
00068             nodeJ = graph.getNode(j);
00069             var distance = new Distance();
00070             distance.calculate( nodeI.position, nodeJ.position );
00071             this.drawEdge( nodeI, nodeJ, distance );
00072           }
00073         }
00074       }
00075     }
00076   },
00077 
00078   //
00079   setOriginText: function( text ) {
00080     this['origin'].innerHTML=text;
00081   },
00082 
00083   nodeRadius: function( node ) {
00084 //    return( NODE_RADIUS );
00085     return( node.mass*4 );
00086   },
00087 
00088   // draw the node at it's current position
00089   drawNode: function( node ) {
00090     try {
00091       this.getNode(node.id).style.left = (this['frame_left'] + node['position']['x']) +'px';
00092       this.getNode(node.id).style.top = (this['frame_top'] + node['position']['y']) +'px';
00093     } catch( e ) {
00094     }
00095   },
00096 
00097   // draw the frame
00098   drawFrame: function( frame_width, frame_height ) {
00099     this['frame_width']=frame_width;
00100     this['frame_height']=frame_height;
00101     
00102     // FGraph control - don't change the size of the container
00103     //this.frame.style.width=parseInt(frame_width) +'px';
00104     //this.frame.style.height=parseInt(frame_height) +'px';
00105   },
00106 
00107   // draw the origin
00108   drawOrigin: function( node ) {
00109     // FGraph control - WPS automatically does this
00110     return;
00111     this.origin.style.left = (this['frame_left'] + node['position']['x']) +'px';
00112     this.origin.style.top = (this['frame_top'] + node['position']['y']) +'px';
00113   },
00114 
00115   // add an edge to the display
00116   addEdge: function( nodeI, nodeJ ) {
00117     var edge = document.createElement("div");
00118     edge.id = 'edge'+nodeI.id+':'+nodeJ.id;
00119     document.body.appendChild(edge);
00120   },
00121 
00122   // add a node to the display
00123   addNode: function( node, text ) {
00124     var domNode;
00125     
00126     if ( text ) {
00127       domNode = textNodeTmpl.cloneNode(true);
00128       domNode.innerHTML = text;
00129     } else {
00130       var radius = this.nodeRadius(node);
00131       domNode = nodeTmpl.cloneNode(true);
00132       domNode.style.MozBorderRadius = (radius * 4) +'px';
00133       domNode.style.width = (radius*2) + "px";
00134       domNode.style.height = (radius*2) + "px";
00135     }
00136     domNode.id='node'+node.id;
00137     document.body.appendChild(domNode);
00138     
00139     domNode.style.left = parseInt(node['position']['x']) +'px';
00140     domNode.style.top = parseInt(node['position']['y']) +'px';
00141 
00142     return domNode;
00143   },
00144 
00145   // return the UI representation of the graph node
00146   getNode: function( nodeId ) {
00147     if ( nodeId == 'origin' ) {
00148       return document.getElementById( 'origin' );
00149     }
00150     return document.getElementById( 'node' + nodeId );
00151   },
00152 
00153   // render an edge
00154   drawEdge: function ( nodeI, nodeJ, distance ) {
00155 
00156     // edges should appear between center of nodes
00157     var centeri = new Object();
00158     centeri['x'] = this['frame_left'] + nodeI['position']['x'] + this.nodeRadius( nodeI );
00159     centeri['y'] = this['frame_top'] + nodeI['position']['y'] + this.nodeRadius( nodeI );
00160 
00161     var centerj = new Object();
00162     centerj['x'] = this['frame_left'] + nodeJ['position']['x'] + this.nodeRadius( nodeJ );
00163     centerj['y'] = this['frame_top'] + nodeJ['position']['y'] + this.nodeRadius( nodeJ );
00164 
00165     // get a distance vector between nodes
00166     var distance = new Distance();
00167     distance.calculate( centeri, centerj );
00168 
00169     // draw line
00170     // k+factor at end determines dot frequency
00171     var l = 8;
00172     for ( var k=0; k<l; k++ ) {
00173       var p = (distance['d'] / l) * k;
00174       var pix;
00175 
00176       try {
00177         // dom updates are expensive ... recycle where we can
00178         if ( !document.getElementById('edge' + nodeI.id + ':' + nodeJ.id + ':' + k) ) {
00179           pix = pixTmpl.cloneNode(true);
00180           pix.id = 'edge' + nodeI.id + ':' + nodeJ.id + ':' + k;
00181           document.getElementById('edge' + nodeI.id + ':' + nodeJ.id).appendChild(pix);
00182         } else {
00183           pix = document.getElementById('edge' + nodeI.id + ':' + nodeJ.id + ':' + k);
00184         }
00185         pix.style.left=(centeri['x'] +(-1)*p*(distance['dx']/distance['d'])) +'px';
00186         pix.style.top=(centeri['y'] +(-1)*p*(distance['dy']/distance['d'])) +'px';
00187       } catch ( e ) {
00188 
00189       }
00190 
00191     }
00192   }
00193 }

00195 // Text Node Template
00196 var textNodeTmpl = document.createElement('div');
00197 textNodeTmpl.style.position = 'absolute';
00198 textNodeTmpl.style.zIndex = 3;
00199 textNodeTmpl.style.fontFamily = "sans-serif";
00200 textNodeTmpl.style.fontSize = "12px";
00201 textNodeTmpl.style.textAlign = "center";
00202 textNodeTmpl.style.height = "16px";
00203 textNodeTmpl.style.textAlign = "left";

00206 var color = new Object();
00207 color['adjective']="http://youarehere.kylescholz.com/cgi-bin/pinpoint.pl?title=&r=" +
00208   (NODE_RADIUS*2) + "&pt=8&b=656565&c=99ee55";
00209 color['adverb']="http://youarehere.kylescholz.com/cgi-bin/pinpoint.pl?title=&r=" +
00210   (NODE_RADIUS*2) + "&pt=8&b=656565&c=eeee66";
00211 color['verb']="http://youarehere.kylescholz.com/cgi-bin/pinpoint.pl?title=&r=" +
00212   (NODE_RADIUS*2) + "&pt=8&b=656565&c=ee9944";
00213 color['noun']="http://youarehere.kylescholz.com/cgi-bin/pinpoint.pl?title=&r=" +
00214   (NODE_RADIUS*2) + "&pt=8&b=656565&c=6688ee";
00215 
00216 var nodeTmpl = document.createElement('div');
00217 nodeTmpl.style.position = 'absolute';
00218 nodeTmpl.style.zIndex = 2;
00219 nodeTmpl.style.width = (NODE_RADIUS*2) + "px";
00220 nodeTmpl.style.height = (NODE_RADIUS*2) + "px";
00221 nodeTmpl.innerHTML="<img height=1 width=1/>";
00222 
00223 // Edge Point Template
00224 var pixTmpl = document.createElement( 'div' );
00225 pixTmpl.style.width = 2 +'px';
00226 pixTmpl.style.height = 2 +'px';
00227 pixTmpl.style.backgroundColor = '#888888';
00228 pixTmpl.style.position = 'absolute';
00229 pixTmpl.innerHTML="<img height=1 width=1/>";
